Header.headText1: We provide you with the latest telemedicine solutions with a selection of specialists.
Header.headText2: Consult the best doctors online immediately or book an appointment at the clinic easily... All medical services are now at your fingertips.

services.title: The services we provide
services.subTitle: We are always here to provide you with care and consultation

services.title: Medical Consultation
services.text: Communicate with doctors directly through video or chat consultations, and get your answers as quickly as possible.

services.title: Prescriptions
services.text: Get accurate prescriptions from doctors, and easily order the medications you need.

services.title: Medical Tests
services.text: Receive accurate and fast results through medical tests, and request them from your home.

ADS.title: Do you need help choosing the right service?
ADS.text: Our team is here to guide you in selecting the most suitable service for your needs.

Doctors.title: Doctors Team
Doctors.subTitle: A selection of specialized doctors to provide the best remote healthcare

sec1.name: Dr. Ahmed Al-Ali
sec1.text: Consultant in general medicine, with extensive experience in providing healthcare to patients.

sec2.name: Dr. Mohammed Bin Zaidan
sec2.text: Consultant in pediatrics, providing comprehensive care for children of all ages.

sec3.name: Dr. Sarah Al-Nuaimi
sec3.text: Consultant in obstetrics and gynecology, providing comprehensive care for women.

sec4.name: Dr. Ali Al-Shammari
sec4.text: Consultant in psychiatry, providing psychological support and treatment for patients.

lastFeatures.title: Start your health journey now
lastFeatures.subTitle: We are here to provide you with the medical support you deserve. Consult a selection of certified doctors easily and at any time that suits you, and enjoy a safe, fast, and personalized service for your health needs.

About.title: About Us
About.subTitle: Specialist Platform is a leading digital platform in the field of telemedicine, aiming to provide exceptional medical services in an innovative, safe, and accessible way.
About.visionText: To deliver exceptional healthcare by utilizing modern technology and achieving the highest levels of quality and efficiency in the medical services provided.
About.missionText: To provide innovative, safe, and accessible medical services through an integrated digital platform that connects doctors and patients, ensuring exceptional healthcare.

someServices.text: Easily and securely obtain accurate medical prescriptions from doctors
Conduct medical tests and receive results quickly and accurately
Easily book appointments with specialized doctors
Regular follow-ups with doctors to ensure your health and safety

values.title: Our Values
values.subTitle: We believe in the importance of core values that guide our work and define our identity, and we are committed to applying them in all aspects of our services.

valuesList.description: We are committed to delivering our services at the highest level of professionalism.
We always strive to provide innovative solutions that meet our clients' needs.
We ensure honesty and transparency in all our services.
We believe in the importance of respecting everyone and fostering positive relationships.
We work as a team to achieve our shared goals.

Footer.description: Sehatee platform is with you every step of the way towards better health, and we are always happy to hear from you

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: When you delete your account, all your data and personal information will be permanently deleted
